org.apache.flink.configuration

类 ResourceManagerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.configuration.ResourceManagerOptions

  • @PublicEvolving
public class ResourceManagerOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    The set of configuration options relating to the ResourceManager

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> CONTAINERIZED_HEAP_CUTOFF_MIN
      Minimum amount of heap memory to remove in containers, as a safety margin.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Float> CONTAINERIZED_HEAP_CUTOFF_RATIO
      Percentage of heap space to remove from containers (YARN / Mesos), to compensate for other JVM memory usage.
      static java.lang.String CONTAINERIZED_MASTER_ENV_PREFIX
      Prefix for passing custom environment variables to Flink's master process.
      static java.lang.String CONTAINERIZED_TASK_MANAGER_ENV_PREFIX
      Similar to the CONTAINERIZED_MASTER_ENV_PREFIX, this configuration prefix allows setting custom environment variables for the workers (TaskManagers)
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> IPC_PORT 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> JOB_TIMEOUT
      Timeout for jobs which don't have a job manager as leader assigned.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> LOCAL_NUMBER_RESOURCE_MANAGER 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      限定符 构造器和说明
      private ResourceManagerOptions()
      Not intended to be instantiated

    • 字段详细资料

      • JOB_TIMEOUT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> JOB_TIMEOUT
        Timeout for jobs which don't have a job manager as leader assigned.

      • LOCAL_NUMBER_RESOURCE_MANAGER

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> LOCAL_NUMBER_RESOURCE_MANAGER

      • IPC_PORT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> IPC_PORT

      • CONTAINERIZED_HEAP_CUTOFF_RATIO

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Float> CONTAINERIZED_HEAP_CUTOFF_RATIO
        Percentage of heap space to remove from containers (YARN / Mesos), to compensate for other JVM memory usage.

      • CONTAINERIZED_HEAP_CUTOFF_MIN

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> CONTAINERIZED_HEAP_CUTOFF_MIN
        Minimum amount of heap memory to remove in containers, as a safety margin.

      • CONTAINERIZED_MASTER_ENV_PREFIX

        public static final java.lang.String CONTAINERIZED_MASTER_ENV_PREFIX
        Prefix for passing custom environment variables to Flink's master process. For example for passing LD_LIBRARY_PATH as an env variable to the AppMaster, set: containerized.master.env.LD_LIBRARY_PATH: "/usr/lib/native" in the flink-conf.yaml.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • CONTAINERIZED_TASK_MANAGER_ENV_PREFIX

        public static final java.lang.String CONTAINERIZED_TASK_MANAGER_ENV_PREFIX
        Similar to the CONTAINERIZED_MASTER_ENV_PREFIX, this configuration prefix allows setting custom environment variables for the workers (TaskManagers)
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        Not intended to be instantiated
